This is a game you're going to need to learn. But what makes this game so good is you're able to chose from killer or survivor. I'd suggest playing with some friends or find some in the DBD official discord server. Some things you should learn before playing is understanding how perks are used and obtained. Leveling up your blood web to obtain tools and perks to increase you're chances of escaping. Learn what your perks do and look up videos on good perks to run on how your play style is I tough this to my younger brother and he is now rank 8 after only 1-2 month of playing. Some youtubers I'd suggest watching is RedGearsGaming, ayrun, and much more. Watch there gameplay and take notes on how they play at higher ranks and demolish those noob killers/survivors. My review is going to be a +1 for this game.

fun and underrated game. worth the $20 and is both a game you can play with friends, or solo. i have a couple problems with the game though, such as the heavy reliance on the killer for your match to be enjoyable. the killer can completely just ruin your mood and make you not want to play the game very easily. also has one of the most toxic communities, if not the most toxic. my BIGGEST problem though, is the unbalanced queue at night. you have to wait up to 15 minutes just to get into a survivor match with friends. i find myself wanting to play at night sometimes, but i cant because of the long queue times. for killer, i dont really have any issues. i dont play killer as often as survivor, but when i do, the only thing i have problems with is sweaty (and toxic) swfs. i dont run into them normally, but when i do, it discourages me to play killer.

if you run stretched res and mods

game is nice, game is cool, game is wow

Literally in the beginning of this year I recommended this game, but after what they are doing with NFT Not only dose this show how the devs care more for money then for the community, but also endangers this game as a whole, due to steams policy of removing games that use NFT. If you want to play a game like this, where the devs actually do care, I would suggest to look into this upcoming game VHS.

 I'm disappointed of how this game fell so quick, in less then a year. I hope other game company's learn what not to do from dbds failures. 


Below was my old review that was posed December 31, 2020.

How it feels to play
Survivor:
𝒯𝑒𝓇𝓇𝑜𝓇 𝒶𝓃𝒹 𝒜𝓃𝓍𝒾𝑒𝓉𝓎

Killer:
𝘽𝙡𝙤𝙤𝙙 𝙏𝙝𝙞𝙧𝙨𝙩
4년 된 게임이 굴러가고 있다는거 자체가 잘 만든 게임이라는 것에 대한 인증이라고 생각합니다. 기술 전승이 진입 장벽을 높이고 있긴 하지만, 시간이 해결해줄 수 있는 영역입니다. DLC들은 할인할때 필요한것만 사시면 되고, 생존자의 경우라면 딱히 살 필요가 없습니다. 살인마라 하더라고 전승에서 나오길 바라면 되고요.
额，很早就知道这个游戏，最近一个月入手的，基本都在玩屠夫，游戏很好玩，但是我想知道为什么有的时候游戏刚开始半分钟都不到就开了2台机，我看了特别多的视频都没有这种情况，玩的久的大佬有没有也遇到的，能不能告诉一下是什么技能吗？还是挂

Игра пушечная, чилишь, пробежку устраиваешь и иногда прыгаешь через препятствия . Бег с препятствием всегда полезен для физической подготовки человека!!! Ещё догоняет  большие дяди или тёти потому что они не хотят чтобы вы починили генераторы и смогли сидеть с wi-fi в соц.сетях , а т.к ваши родители вам запрещают , то придётся потрудиться и делать всё скрытно чтобы вас не поймали и не уложили спать !!! Потому что лечь спать без новой серии А4 это день насмарку!!! Всем советую поиграть в симулятор бега!!!

There is so much of this game that it does right and so much that it does wrong.

The Bad:
90% of this community are awful, hypocritical, entitled babies who have god complexes because this game gives so much power to people. So much so that they forget the fact that there are people on the other side of the screen. You honestly can't play this game without someone complaining about the game
Balance is awful
Servers are awful
Bugs are out of wack
Updates are rushed
Main focus is about cosmetic of the game right now
The Grind is awful
The Game is consistently 7.99 USD because of its horrid grind and dlc amount
Ruin Alotta things

The Good:
Cosmetics are getting better
Visuals are getting better
The Amount of updates is plentiful. However horribly buggy everytime.

The beginning of the game, when you are fresh meat. Best time of to play it. Otherwise not worth it

After multiple updates, the game is still not worth especially after the MMR update. Not worth the money
